content: jo s super easy tortelloni cat toys note the yarn may get tight on your increase row try to leave a bit of extra slack than normal cast on 4 sts onto size 4 dpns slide 2 sts onto a second dpn for ease of joining round 1 *kfb repeat from * 8 sts during round 1 do each set of kfb on its own needle this will result in 4 needles with 2 sts each round 2 knit round 3 *kfb repeat from * 16 sts round 4 knit round 5 knit round 6 *kfb repeat from * 32 sts round 7 knit round 8 knit round 9 knit round 10 knit round 11 *kfb repeat from * 64 sts round 12 knit round 13 knit fold the piece in half and cast off half the stitches 32 using the three-needle cast off put in your stuffing + catnip packet tuck in any loose bits of yarn and polyfil and cast off the remaining stitches cut yarn leaving 4-5 inches of tail and use the tail to sew the two ends of the tortelloni together or simply weave in the tail without sewing for a pierogi toss at your cat and enjoy
